start.name: Lyra
sentences: Your mind built this place to protect you… but it’s breaking because a part of you is finally ready to wake up.
The fractures you’re seeing aren’t dangers. They’re memories trying to surface.
Every step you take is pulling the truth closer.

options.text: So you're… just a part of me?

choice_why_not.name: Lyra
sentences: I wasn’t allowed to. I was made from the pieces you sealed away—your fear, your regret, the echoes of someone you lost.
If I told you too soon, you would’ve rejected all of this. You would’ve rejected me.
You had to choose to look back, not be forced to.
And now… you’re finally doing it.

choice_part_of_me.name: Lyra
sentences: Not just a part. I’m the part you trust the most.
I’m everything you didn’t want to face alone.
But you’re growing whole again, piece by piece.
When you step into the Memory Core… you won’t need me in the same way.
Will you still want me here?

choice_help_remember.name: Lyra
sentences: That’s what I’ve been waiting for you to say.
Follow the cracks in the walls. They’re not damage—they’re pathways.
Each one leads to a truth you buried the day the collapse happened.
When we reach the Memory Core Room… everything you’ve hidden will demand to be seen.

memorycore_door.name: Lyra
sentences: This is where the fragments converge.
Once we step inside, you won’t be able to look away from the truth.
If Lyra’s memory is calling you back… it’s because you’re ready.
Take a breath.
When you open this door, you’ll remember the moment everything changed.
And the moment you lost her.

end.name: Lyra
sentences: Whatever happens in there…
you won’t face it alone.
